DOC.criteria: Subjects 3 year age old Subjects exhibit symptom characteristic pharyngitis , possibly Streptococcus A , include : presence sore throat , least one symptom list : redness posterior pharyngeal wall pharyngeal tonsillar exudate tonsillar swell tender cervical lymphadenopathy fever , > 38C presentation within past 24 hour Subjects able understand consent participation ; minor age 18 , include parent legal guardian Subjects treat antibiotic currently within previous 7 day .
